description:
Following unit test are failing on latest nova/master 
commitID: 19dc70f0c035d7dfa3c50e9e3e30357cb968fafb

Failed tests: http://paste.openstack.org/show/41721/

Instance UUID should be returned in dictionary by mocked methods on following lines:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/network/test_manager.py#L546
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/network/test_manager.py#L588
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/network/test_manager.py#L1063
title: network_manager unit test failing due to KeyError

comments.content:

Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/3f2d24bf899e37af881c87926872995a81c43442
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 3f2d24bf899e37af881c87926872995a81c43442
Author: Aswad Rangnekar <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jul 25 02:53:48 2013 -0700

    Fix failing network manager unit tests
    
    * Instance uuid was not returned by the mocked methods of some
      network manager unit tests causing them to fail with KeyError.
    
    Fixes bug #1204810
    
    Change-Id: Iee04872ea954c2c59b1bf24e7cb0058c59ae8a84
